left.question: Am I eligible to participate?
left.answer: This year, GryphHacks will run fully virtually! Although we were super excited to welcome everyone to the University of Guelph to meet and collaborate with everyone in-person, the health and safety of our hackies, mentors, and judges remain our top priority.

left.question: How many people can be on a team?
left.answer: You can form teams of up to 4 people. There are no restrictions for who they can be, so you can team up with hackers from any school, country, or experience level. Teams can be formed before or during the event.

left.question: When and how will I hear back about my application?
left.answer: Sit tight, our team will be reviewing your applications over the next few weeks. Decisions will be sent via email after Round 2 closes. Keep an eye on our Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn for updates!

right.question: How much does it cost to attend GryphHacks?
right.answer: Admission to GryphHacks is completely free! We will provide all the resources and mentorship our hackers need to build something incredible.

right.question: How will communication work?
right.answer: Prior to the event, we’ll be sharing updates on our Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and through our mailing list. During the event, you’ll get live updates and announcements through our Discord server.
